CustomField.inlineHelpText: How likely are you to make and stick to a financial plan?
CustomField.label: Planning own finances

value.fullName: I have a plan and am good at sticking to it
value.label: I have a plan and am good at sticking to it

value.fullName: I have a plan but don't always have enough money to stick to it
value.label: I have a plan but don't always have enough money to stick to it

value.fullName: I rarely make a plan but have sufficient income to cover my immediate expenses each month
value.label: I rarely make a plan but have sufficient income to cover my immediate expenses each month

value.fullName: I rarely make a plan and usually run out of money before my next payday
value.label: I rarely make a plan and usually run out of money before my next payday

value.fullName: I don't have a plan and generally struggle with managing my money
value.label: I don't have a plan and generally struggle with managing my money
